name: "Horror and Zombies" Flash Art
description: Need some inspiration for your next tattoo?  Look no further than this brand-new collection of flash art by BIGCHRIS!

name: Killer Lineup
description: Which one will you pick out of this "killer" lineup?   Whether you pick Leatherface, Jigsaw, Freddy Krueger, Jason or Michael Myers as the killer you will definitely be right!

name: Michael Rooker "Walking Dead" Numbered Print
description: BIGCHRIS created this original image of the character Merle Dixon (played by Michael Rooker) - who became one of the most famous zombies in the Walking Dead series. There will only be 100 copies of this print ever sold. Each print will be hand numbered and signed by BOTH Michael Rooker and BIGCHRIS

name: Addy Miller "Walking Dead" Numbered Print
description: BIGCHRIS created this original image of one of the most iconic zombies in the Walking Dead opening episode of season one; played by Addy Miller. There will only be 100 copies of this print ever sold. Each print will be hand numbered and signed by BOTH Addy Miller and BIGCHRIS

name: OG Frank
description: 11 x 17" art print

name: Slasher Combo Pack
description:
We've "slashed" the prices for this combo pack.  Get 5 prints for the price of 4! 

5 high-quality 11x17" prints:

-Michael Myers
-Chucky
-Jason
-Freddy
-Leatherface

name: Slasher Michael Myers Print
description: 11 x 17" high-quality color print

name: Slasher Chucky Print
description: 11 x 17" high-quality color print

name: Slasher Freddy Print
description:
BIGCHRIS just completed this totally new version of Freddy.   

11x17 Color print.

name: Slasher Leatherface Print
description: Leatherface 11" x 17" quality print

name: Slasher Jason Print
description:
Get your horror fix with Jason from the Friday the 13th horror franchise.

11x17 Color print.

name: Slasher Combo CANVAS Pack
description:
We've "slashed" the prices for this combo pack.  Get 5 prints for the price of 4! 

5 gallery-quality 16x32" canvas prints:

-Michael Myers
-Chucky
-Jason
-Freddy
-Leatherface

name: Slasher Michael Myers 16" x 32" Canvas Print
Slasher Chucky 16" x 32" Canvas Print
description:
You cannot fully appreciate this print of Chucky until you see it full-size at 32" tall!  

16" x 32" high quality canvas print with black painted sides.  Ready to hang and display.

name: Slasher Leatherface 16" x 32" Canvas Print
description:
You cannot fully appreciate this print of Leatherface until you see it full-size at 32" tall!  

16" x 32" high quality canvas print with black painted sides.  Ready to hang and display.

name: Slasher Freddy 16" x 32" Canvas Print
description:
You cannot fully appreciate this print of Freddy until you see it full-size at 32" tall!  

16" x 32" high quality canvas print with black painted sides.  Ready to hang and display.

name: Slasher Jason 16" x 32" Canvas Print
description:
You cannot fully appreciate this print of Jason until you see it full-size at 32" tall!  

16" x 32" high quality canvas print with black painted sides.  Ready to hang and display.

name: Slasher Poker Print
description:
What would happen if your favorite horror movie characters played poker together?  BIGCHRIS has a pretty good idea ...

Pencils by: Benjamin Glendenning (skulljammer.com) 

11"x17" color print

name: Slasher Poker 32x24" Canvas Print
description:
Make a big impression by hanging the Slasher Poker canvas print on your wall.  At 32 x 24" you are sure to see all of the details of one of our most popular prints.

Pencils by: Benjamin Glendenning (skulljammer.com)

name: GOREgeous Ladies
description:
Don't let their beauty fool you!  These sexy ladies will steal your heart ... literally.

Pencils by: Alfred Trujillo (alfredtrujillo.com)

name: Nightmares Are Forever Print
description:
Jack and Sally forever!

11 x 17" print inspired by Nightmare Before Christmas

name: Nightmare Before Christmas Color Print
description:
Nightmare Before Christmas 11x17 color print.

Buy it with the line art version and save a few bucks.  Look for the "Nightmare Before Christmas Combo".

name: Nightmare Before Christmas Line Art Print
description:
Nightmare Before Christmas 11x17" line art print.

Buy it with the color version and save a few bucks.  Look for the "Nightmare Before Christmas Combo".

name: Nightmare Before Christmas Combo
description: Get the Nightmare Before Christmas combo pack and save some money.  You will receive the 11x17 print of both the color and line art versions of the Nightmare Before Christmas print.

name: Two-Face Set
description: It doesn't matter whether you identify more with Harvey Dent or Two-Face because now you can get the set for a great price ... buy one get one "half off".

name: Day of the Dead (Heather Moss) Print
description: The model Heather Moss is featured in this beautiful "Day of the Dead" themed art print.

name: UnDead End Print
description: UnDead End print featuring the zombies from the upcoming game Thump-A-Zombie which BIGCHRIS did all of the art for.

name: Weeping Angel Print
description: Don't Blink!  You might miss out on the latest print from BIGCHRIS that is perfect for all you Dr. Who fans.

name: Devil Print
description: Devil 11 x 17" Print

name: Monsters Line Art
description: Line art print of all the classic monsters.  Size is 11x17

name: BAD ACE Royal Flush
description:
Buy the entire "Royal Flush" and get all five BAD ACE prints in one set.  You get the Ace, King, Queen, Jack and 10.  Save by buying the complete set and get 5 prints for the price of 4!


Additional Savings!

If you order the Royal Flush you can get half off one of the Bad Ace shirts by entering one of the following coupon codes during checkout:
KINGSHIRT - FREE* King of Hearts Variant tee
QUEENSHIRT - FREE* Queen of Hearts tee
QUEENPREMIUM - Half off the Men's Queen of Hearts Premium tee

*The system will only let us take 99% off the price so as free as we can make it.

name: BAD ACE Ace of Hearts Print
description: BAD ACE Ace of Hearts 11 x 17" print.

name: BAD ACE King of Hearts Print
description: BAD ACE King of Hearts 11 x 17" print.

name: BAD ACE Queen of Hearts Print
description: BAD ACE Queen of Hearts 11 x 17" print.

name: BAD ACE Jack of Hearts Print
description: BAD ACE Jack of Hearts 11 x 17" print.

name: BAD ACE Ten of Hearts Print
description: BAD ACE Ten of Hearts 11 x 17" print.

name: BAD ACE King/Queen Combo
description: Buy them both and save!  For a limited time you can buy the King and Queen together and save $5 to buy another print (or whatever you want outside of our shop if you must).

name: Bad Ace Royal Flush 11x17" CANVAS Set
description:
Get the full BAD ACE Royal Flush of Hearts on Canvas.  You get the Ace, King, Queen, Jack and 10.  Each 11x17" canvas print has black painted edges.  These are ready to arrange and display right out of the box!  

And by buying them as a set you save $100 off the price of buying them individually!


Additional Savings!

If you order the Royal Flush you can get half off one of the Bad Ace shirts by entering one of the following coupon codes during checkout:
KINGSHIRT - FREE* King of Hearts Variant tee
QUEENSHIRT - FREE* Queen of Hearts tee
QUEENPREMIUM - Half off the Men's Queen of Hearts Premium tee

*The system will only let us take 99% off the price so as free as we can make it.

name: BAD ACE Ace of Hearts 11x17" CANVAS Print
description: Get the BAD ACE Ace of Hearts print on ready-to-display canvas format.  11x17" with painted black edges.

name: BAD ACE King of Hearts 11x17" CANVAS Print
description: Get the BAD ACE King of Hearts print on ready-to-display canvas format.  11x17" with painted black edges.

name: BAD ACE Queen of Hearts 11x17" CANVAS Print
description: Get the BAD ACE Queen of Hearts print on ready-to-display canvas format.  11x17" with painted black edges.

name: BAD ACE Jack of Hearts 11x17" CANVAS Print
description: Get the BAD ACE Jack of Hearts print on ready-to-display canvas format.  11x17" with painted black edges.

name: BAD ACE Ten of Hearts 11x17" CANVAS Print
description: Get the BAD ACE Ten of Hearts print on ready-to-display canvas format.  11x17" with painted black edges.

name: Monster Hoodie
description: Grab one of our first run of Monster Hottie Hoodies while you can.  We did a very limited run of these.  They are currently only available in white print on black fabric.  The fabric is very soft and lightweight to extend the wearable season.

name: Monster Hottie *Limited* Mauve/Charcoal tank
description: We did a test run of these for Amazing AZ Comic Con and we sold everything we had except for these last three pieces.  We don't know whether this design of Mauve print on Charcoal tank will get another run or not so if you want one this might be your last chance!

name: Nicole Chilelli Collection
description:
These are BIGCHRISART renditions of make up creations by Nicole Chillelli.  Nicole was the winner of Syfy channel's hit show Face Off Season 3.

You can get all four prints for a reduced price.  These are available for a limited time so get yours while you can!

name: Nicole Chilelli Print - Cyborg
description: Nicole - CYBORG!  These are BIGCHRISART renditions of make up creations by Nicole Chilelli.  Nicole was the winner of Syfy channel's hit show Face Off Season 3.

name: Nicole Chilelli Print - Sea Demon
description: Nicole - SEA DEMON!  These are BIGCHRISART renditions of make up creations by Nicole Chilelli.  Nicole was the winner of Syfy channel's hit show Face Off Season 3.

name: Nicole Chilelli Print - Dr. Seuss
description: Nicole - DR. SEUSS!  These are BIGCHRISART renditions of make up creations by Nicole Chilelli.  Nicole was the winner of Syfy channel's hit show Face Off Season 3.

name: Nicole Chilelli Print - Day of the Dead
description: Nicole - DAY OF THE DEAD!  These are BIGCHRISART renditions of make up creations by Nicole Chilelli.  Nicole was the winner of Syfy channel's hit show Face Off Season 3.

name: Superman Print
description: Superman full color 11x17" print

name: Superman Variant Print
description: Red and Gray 11x17" print

name: The Flash Canvas Collection
description:
This 3 piece canvas collection is almost 5' wide installed, making it our most ambitious art offering yet!  The photo we took does not represent the true colors very well.  This set is as bright and vivid as the smaller print that some of you may have seen (we've included a picture of the print to show the true colors).  Each canvas print has a painted black border.

Each piece is 32" high.  
Each piece comes with mounting hardware.

name: Have a Sucky Day  Unisex Tee
description:
Wear the vampire smiley tee and tell the world how you really feel!

You will love this 100% combed cotton ultra-soft shirt.

name: Have a Nice Decay  Unisex Tee
description: Try on the mummy version of the classic smiley design.  You will love this 100% combed cotton ultra-soft shirt.

name: Have a Nice Brains  Unisex Tee
description: This zombified smiley is definitely having a nice day looking for brains.   You will love this 100% combed cotton ultra-soft shirt.

name: Unisex BIGCHRISART Skull Logo Tee
description:
BIGCHRIS just released this BRAND NEW logo shirt with a subtle skull design.  At the time BIGCHRIS labeled this his "favorite" of the BCA logo shirts.  We think you will agree!

This shirt is "unisex" so it will work great for both men and women!

name: Monster Hotties Tank Top
description: This tank is definitely for the hotties - you know who you are!  These top-quality "slub" cotton tanks are soft and light as a feather.  Get one today.  Your skin will thank you.

name: Monster Hotties Babydoll Tee
description: This shirt is definitely for the hotties - you know who you are!  These top-quality "slub" cotton tees are soft and light as a feather.  Get one today.  Your skin will thank you.

name: Monster Hotties Baby & Toddler Apparel
description: You asked for it - BIGCHRIS delivered it!  We finally have some Monster Hotties baby and toddler apparel.  This first batch is very limited so get yours while supplies last!

name: Men's BAD ACE - King of Hearts VARIANT Tee
description: This historic King of Hearts shirt is one of the first designs completed from the BAD ACE line that we are unleashing over the next few months.  Now BIGCHRIS has released a brand new VARIANT version of the shirt with more a more subtle but intense look than the full color original.

name: Men's BAD ACE - Queen of Hearts "Premium" Tee
description:
Due to overwhelming demand we are finally making the Queen design available for men.   We decided to pull out all the stops for this one.  Take one look, and then a quick feel and you will know that this is the absolute top quality shirt you can find.  It has brilliant color detail, and feels as soft as silk.  Once you put it on you will not want to take it off.

As A. Jay the singer from Lit said - "This is one bad-ass shirt"

name: Women's BAD ACE - Queen of Hearts
description: This historic Queen of Hearts shirt is one of the first designs completed from the BAD ACE Cards line that we are unleashing over the next few months.  Own a piece of history by buying one of the first ever Queen of Hearts tees.

name: Men's Day of the Dead "Timeless" Tee
description: Heather Moss was the model who inspired (and is featured in) this Day of the Dead themed print.  The shirt is top quality 100% cotton with the quality that you have come to expect from BIGCHRISART.

name: Women's Day of the Dead "Timeless" Tee
description: You'll love our "vintage" style Day of the Dead "Timeless" Tee.  This one has a one-of-a-kind feminine cut that you will love.  It features a "seamless" style collar and sleeves that feels great and looks awesome.

name: Men's BIGCHRISART Logo
description: This shirt is one of the best ways to show that you are part of the BIGCHRISART asylum.  The logo tee looks great, and the shirt is top-quality as always.

name: Women's BIGCHRISART Logo
description: This shirt is one of the best ways to show that you are part of the BIGCHRISART asylum.  The logo tee looks great, and the shirt is top-quality as always.

name: Limited Edition Sketch Shirt - Wolverine
description:
You are going to have to be lightning-fast to get this deal before it is gone.  We have only made 10 shirts with this design.  Each shirt will be hand-numbered and signed by BIGCHRIS.  The shirts are made from the absolute highest quality fabric available.  It will be the softest t-shirt you ever wear.  But why would you wear a work of art like this?  It belongs in a museum or on your wall.  Ok you can wear it if you want, but not if it you don't get one soon because next time you come back it will probably be gone!

This shirt comes in Men's XL and L only

name: Limited Edition Sketch Shirt - Hulk
description: You are going to have to be lightning-fast to get this deal before it is gone. We have only made 10 shirts with this design. Each shirt will be hand-numbered and signed by BIGCHRIS. The shirts are made from the absolute highest quality fabric available. It will be the softest t-shirt you ever wear. But why would you wear a work of art like this? It belongs in a museum or on your wall. Ok you can wear it if you want, but not if it you don't get one soon because next time you come back it will probably be gone! For a limited time you will get a free 11x17" Hulk print along with the shirt.

name: Limited Edition Sketch Shirt - Joker
description:
You are going to have to be lightning-fast to get this deal before it is gone.  We have only made 10 shirts with this design.  Each shirt will be hand-numbered and signed by BIGCHRIS.  The shirts are made from the absolute highest quality fabric available.  It will be the softest t-shirt you ever wear.  But why would you wear a work of art like this?  It belongs in a museum or on your wall.  Ok you can wear it if you want, but not if it you don't get one soon because next time you come back it will probably be gone!

This shirt comes in Men's XL and L only

name: Jumbo Limited Edition Joker Shirt
description: This limited edition jumbo "Joker" print has been one of our best sellers.  We only have a few left so grab yours today if you want one.

name: Fight Club - RULES
description: "The first rule of fight club is you do not talk about fight club ..."  First Tyler Durden immortalized those words in the Fight Club movie.  Now BIGCHRISART has captured the rules and the spirit of the movie in this new Fight Club - RULES print.

name: Hulk Print
description:
Hulk 11x17" print

BIGCHRIS took his time putting out his Hulk print because The Hulk is one his favorite characters.  Hopefully you agree it was worth the wait.

name: Joker Color Print (Revisited)
description:
Joker color 11x17 print.

This is the brand new version of the favorite Joker print that sold out of it's limited run much too fast.  This version features enhanced colors and a detailed image of Batman on the card instead of the blank card from the previous version.

name: Joker Line Art Print
description:
Joker line art 11 x 17" print

The “JOKER” in full color was our fastest selling BIGCHRISART print of all time.  Still today it is our most requested print at conventions and events.  Unfortunately, we only ran a limited edition set of 50 prints.  But after overwhelming request we have decided to rerelease JOKER REVISITED with a new color pass and an illustrated playing card.

name: Captain America Combo
description: For a limited time you can get the vivid full-color print and the line-art version of the print for just $15.  Both prints are 11x17"

name: Captain America Color Print
description:
Captain America full color 11x17" print.

Buy it with the line art version and save a few bucks.  Look for the "Captain America Combo".

name: Captain America Line Art Print
description:
Captain America line art 11 x 17" print.

Buy it with the color version and save a few bucks.  Look for the "Captain America Combo".

name: Punisher Combo
description: Buy the Punisher color and line art prints together and save a few bucks!

name: Punisher Color Print
description:
Punisher color 11x17"  "Punish This!" print.

Buy it together with the line art version and save a few bucks.  Look for the "Punisher Combo".

name: Punisher Line Art Print
description:
Punisher line art 11x17 "Punish This" print.  

Buy it together with the color version and save a few bucks.  Look for the "Punisher Combo".

name: Dead Pool Print
description: 11" x 17" Dead Pool Print

name: The Flash Print
description: 11" x 17" The Flash Print

name: Spider Man Print
description: 11" x 17" Spider Man Print

name: Wolverine Print
description: 11" x 17" Wolverine Print

name: BAD ACE King of Hearts Mini Print
description:
Now you can get the popular BAD ACE King of Hearts print in a convenient portable size that you can take anywhere.  Perfect for a locker... in your car ... you can take "the King" with you everywhere you go if you like!  

The front of this 5x7" print has the classic BAD ACE King of Hearts, and the back has poem originally penned by the suicide king before he took his own life.

SPECIAL OFFER:  Buy any King of Hearts product and we will add this mini print to your order for free!

name: BAD ACE Queen of Hearts Mini Print
description:
Now you can get the popular BAD ACE Queen of Hearts print in a convenient portable size that you can take anywhere.  Perfect for a locker... in your car ... you can take "the Queen" with you everywhere you go if you like!  

The front of this 5x7" print has the classic BAD ACE Queen of Hearts, and the back has poem originally penned by the queen.

SPECIAL OFFER:  Buy any Queen of Hearts product and we will add this mini print to your order for free!

name: Nightmare Before Christmas Mini Print
description:
Get the Nightmare Before Christmas print in a fun and convenient smaller size.  This version is 5x7" and two-sided.  The first side has the popular Nightmare Before Christmas print, and the back side is a custom BIGCHRISART border where you can create your own work of art, or use it as the coolest postcard ever!

SPECIAL OFFER:  If you buy the Nightmare Before Christmas Combo we will add this miniprint to your order for free.

name: BIGCHRISART 3" Button
description:
Show that you are a proud member of the BIGCHRISART asylum by wearing your BCA button proudly!

SPECIAL OFFER:  Spend more than $20 on other products in the store and we will throw in this button for free!

name: Wolverine 32" x 24" Canvas Limited Edition Print
description:
You will love this limited edition Wolverine canvas print.  We are only selling 25 of this popular print.  At your request BIGCHRIS will hand number and/or sign your canvas print.  The dimensions are 32" x 24".  The canvas is fully wrapped with a black edge so it is ready to hang and display, but you can also put a frame around this standard size canvas.

If you are in the Phoenix area and would like to arrange a pickup be sure to enter "INPERSON" as a coupon code during checkout and the shipping fee will be waived.

name: Nightmare Before Christmas Limited Edition Canvas Print
description:
You will love this limited edition Nightmare Before Christmas canvas print.  We are only selling 25 of this popular print.  At your request BIGCHRIS will hand number and/or sign your canvas print.  The dimensions are 32" x 24".  The canvas is fully wrapped with a black edge so it is ready to hang and display, but you can also put a frame around this standard size canvas.

If you are in the Phoenix area and would like to arrange a pickup be sure to enter "INPERSON" as a coupon code during checkout and the shipping fee will be waived.

name: Wolverine Original Acrylic on Canvas
description: The Wolverine painted with acrylic paint on canvas

name: The Hulk Original Acrylic on Canvas
description: Hopefully you have seen the Hulk art on canvas at one of the shows or the comic shop because you have to see it in person to appreciate how awesome it is.  The acrylic on canvas painting has texturing that makes it truly 3D and like nothing you have seen before.  If you are a Hulk fan you need this in your collection.

name: The Joker Original Acrylic on Canvas
description: The Joker in acrylic paint on canvas
